title: Royal decade
brief_description: A review of some of HM, the Queen’s activities since her Coronation ten years ago. Scenes from Royal visits to India. Pakistan, Ghana, Sierra Leone, Fiji, New Zealand and Australia are shown as well as the Coronation itself, the Trooping the Color and the State Opening of Parliament.
